attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not come from Blackpool however I think I speak for everyone when I say its a hell hole. Everything is run down and there is no longer a nice feeling about the place. So we want the whole of Blackpool to be regenerated, a casino city sounds a bit far fetched however it would work. Blackpool will be a european Las vegas. Anyway just something needs to be done with Blackpool, and fast.
